content.question: The writer wants to combine sentences 5 and 6 to reduce redundancy and ensure precision of meaning. Which of the following changes to “public...unique feature” best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: public, which was being caused by a unique feature
public because of a unique feature in some aspect
public, the cause of this buzz being in part due to a unique feature
public, in part because of a unique feature

content.answer: public, in part because of a unique feature

skill.text: Skill 8.B: Write sentences that clearly convey ideas and arguments.
